```scss
// Property: activityExitTransition
// Description: The type of transition used when activity is exiting.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.NavigationWindow, Ti.UI.TabGroup, Ti.UI.Window
'.activity-exit-transition-explode': { activityExitTransition: Ti.UI.Android.TRANSITION_EXPLODE }
'.activity-exit-transition-fade-in': { activityExitTransition: Ti.UI.Android.TRANSITION_FADE_IN }
'.activity-exit-transition-fade-out': { activityExitTransition: Ti.UI.Android.TRANSITION_FADE_OUT }
'.activity-exit-transition-slide-top': { activityExitTransition: Ti.UI.Android.TRANSITION_SLIDE_TOP }
'.activity-exit-transition-slide-right': { activityExitTransition: Ti.UI.Android.TRANSITION_SLIDE_RIGHT }
'.activity-exit-transition-slide-bottom': { activityExitTransition: Ti.UI.Android.TRANSITION_SLIDE_BOTTOM }
'.activity-exit-transition-slide-left': { activityExitTransition: Ti.UI.Android.TRANSITION_SLIDE_LEFT }
'.activity-exit-transition-none': { activityExitTransition: Ti.UI.Android.TRANSITION_NONE }
```
